name: Tumblr - No Scrolling Avatars
description: Recently Tumblr added an update that changed the position of icons, making them stay visible at the side of the posts as you scroll down your dashboard. I found this distracting so I wrote something up quickly to make it not do that.
additional_info: Updated January 14th 2015: Recent Tumblr update changed the class names used for the scrolling avatars for Chrome/older versions of Firefox. Script has been changed accordingly Updated January 10th 2015: Added additional code for Firefox compatibility (testing was only done on Chrome initially). Thanks to Mar L for suggesting what code to use
